definition: any of numerous small silvery North American cyprinid fishes especially of the genus Notropis
details:
noun
- any of numerous small silvery North American cyprinid fishes especially of the genus Notropis
- important food fish of the northern Atlantic and Mediterranean
= synonyms: common mackerel
- something that shines (with emitted or reflected light)
- a swollen bruise caused by a blow to the eye
= synonyms: mouse, black eye
